Message:
Master said the reason
our powers go berserk is
because we lose control
of our feelings.

The powers of a witch
come from within.

Terror and despair caused
Cerberus to transform into
a Witch of Qlipha.

If only I had
courage back then...
If only I’d been
able to protect her...!

no matter what happens,
I won’t cry anymore.

I’ll get stronger so she
won’t ever get sad again!

I feel determination
burning in my heart,
and I look up towards
the mystical mountain.

She’s there...waiting inside
the violent lightning storm.
